com.btisystems.pronx.ems.core.snmp

Interface ISnmpConfiguration

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SnmpConfiguration, V2cSnmpConfiguration

    public interface ISnmpConfiguration
extends Serializable
    A configuration to be applied to an Snmp Session.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.snmp4j.PDU createPDU(int type)
      Deliver a PDU built from the configuration

    • Method Detail

      • createTarget

        org.snmp4j.Target createTarget(org.snmp4j.smi.Address address)
        Deliver a Target built from the configuration
        Parameters:
        address - the address of the device with which the target is to be associated
        Returns:
        a Target from the configuration

      • createPDU

        org.snmp4j.PDU createPDU(int type)
        Deliver a PDU built from the configuration
        Parameters:
        type - the request type
        Returns:
        a PDU, built from the configuration with the specified request type

      • createSnmpSession

        org.snmp4j.Session createSnmpSession(org.snmp4j.TransportMapping transportMapping)
                                     throws IOException
        Deliver a Session for the specified transport mapping
        Parameters:
        transportMapping - the initial transport mapping
        Returns:
        a Session instance
        Throws:
        IOException - the io exception

      • getVersion

        int getVersion()
        Gets version.
        Returns:
        the SNMP version supported by the configuration.

      • getWalkTimeout

        int getWalkTimeout()
        Gets walk timeout.
        Returns:
        the total walk timeout.

      • getCommunity

        String getCommunity()
        Gets community.
        Returns:
        the Community string used to connect to the remote SNMP agent.

      • setCommunity

        void setCommunity(String community)
        Sets community.
        Parameters:
        community - the community

      • getMaxRepetitions

        int getMaxRepetitions()
        Gets max repetitions.
        Returns:
        the number of objects that should be returned for all the repeating OIDs. Agent's must truncate the list to something shorter if it won't fit within the max-message size supported by the command generator or the agent.

      • getPort

        int getPort()
        Gets the remote agent connection port.
        Returns:
        port port

      • setPort

        void setPort(int port)
        Sets the remote agent connection port.
        Parameters:
        port - on which to connect to the remote SNMP agent.

      • getMaximumColumnsPerPdu

        int getMaximumColumnsPerPdu()
        Gets maximum columns per pdu.
        Returns:
        the maximum number of columns to be retrieved per PDU, when executing a row-wise table walk. See org.snmp4j.util.TableUtils.

      • getMaximumRowsPerPdu

        int getMaximumRowsPerPdu()
        Gets maximum rows per pdu.
        Returns:
        the maximum number of rows to be retrieved per PDU, when executing a row-wise table walk. See org.snmp4j.util.TableUtils.
